description:
This contract needs: Correctional Service of Canada (CSC), CORCAN, in the Prairie Region.
A trade agreement is not applicable under this procurement.
Tendering procedures: All interested suppliers may submit a bid.
Procurement strategy: competitive procurement strategy with the lowest priced compliant bid.
This contract reserve a supplenty for an Indigenous Supplier in accordance with the Teeding Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB).
Occupatians and indegrous entitled Supplier who meet the definition of an Indigenous business are gift to submit a bid.
